MA4269A/ MA4269 Mathematical Finance II
MA5248 Stochastic Analysis in Mathematical Finance
description:
This module introduces the basic techniques in stochastic analysis as well as their applications in mathematical finance.

Major topics: Brownian motion, stochastic calculus, stochastic differential equations, mathematical markets, arbitrage, completeness, optimal stopping problems, stochastic control, risk-neutral pricing, and generalized Black-Scholes models.
title: Stochastic Analysis in Mathematical Finance
